t:
They say that the brain shuts
out traumatic experiences.



I didn't believe it until
I woke up today and
saw blood on my hands.
c:
I've been cleaning the mess, so I'm late here.



#brain #trauma #experience #blood #crime #unknown #hand #unbelievable
